entries.title: Azure Vale Prologue
entries.summary: The siege began when Archivist Lyra unsealed the inkforge beneath the vale.
entries.body: Reports note that Lyra turned the town's scriptorium into a staging ground, binding inkfire to the lanes.

entries.title: Vanguard Columns
entries.summary: Shielded lancers march in measured columns, absorbing turret fire as scribes advance.
entries.body: The vanguard units carry mirrored wards that scatter bolt trajectories. Runners travel behind them, sheltered from arrows.

entries.title: Affix Experiments
entries.summary: Affix-bearing elites rotate experimental wards through the lines to test Azure defenses.
entries.body: Brutes wear overcharged shield lattices while witches weave frost auras to slow repairs. Lyra logs the results in the margin.

entries.title: Archivist's Ledger
entries.summary: Lyra's ledger lists every breach, and she vows to pen the castle's ending herself.
entries.body: Each wave she annotates new countermeasures: inkfire volleys, parchment golems, and notes on turret resonance.
